summary: A filmed version of Phil Silvers' hit Broadway show about a television comic who tried to regain his ratings on TV.
cast: Phil Silvers|Rose Marie|Danny Scholl|Judy Lynn|Jack Albertson|Bradford Hatton|Johnny Coy|Dick Dana|Joey Faye|Johnny Trama|Herbie Faye|Gloria Smith|Walter Darewahl|George Marcy|Flash Hogan|Carolyn Anderson|Mike Barton|Iris Burton|Nikki Cellini|Kathy Collins|Vito Durante|Dave Gard|Kaye Gordon|Dell Hanley|Dee Harless|Emmaline Henry|William Joyce|Walter Koremin|Mara Lynn|Wayne MacIntyre|Marcia Mann|Candy Montgomery|Hank Roberts|Tommy Ryan|Patti Shafter|Joyce Stansell|Sammy Steen|Arlen Stuart|Gloria Wallace|Ed Whitman|Grace Lee Whitney|Charles Zulkeski
director: Directors: Alfred E. Green, Albert Zugsmith (uncredited)
title: Top Banana
